survey.question: Question
survey.thankYouDefault: Your response has been recorded. Thank you for taking the time to complete this survey.
survey.resumeNotice: ðŸ’¾ We found your previous progress. Click continue to pick up where you left off.
survey.closeMessage: You may now close this window.

resume.title: Resume Your Progress?
resume.description: We found your previous answers. Would you like to continue where you left off or start fresh?

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
errors.linkAlreadyUsed: This survey link has already been used. One-time links can only be used once.
errors.linkExpired: This survey link has expired and is no longer valid.
errors.linkDeactivated: This survey link has been deactivated.
errors.linkInvalid: This survey link is not valid.
errors.linkMaxUsesReached: This survey link has reached its maximum usage limit.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: We couldn't load the survey. Please try again later.

notFound.title: Survey Not Found
notFound.description: The survey you're looking for doesn't exist, has been removed, or the link may have expired.
notFound.hint: If you believe this is an error, please contact the survey administrator.

linkAlreadyUsed.title: Link Already Used
linkAlreadyUsed.description: This survey link has already been used. One-time links can only be used once.
linkAlreadyUsed.hint: If you need to complete another survey, please request a new link from the survey administrator.

linkExpired.title: Link Expired
linkExpired.description: This survey link has expired and is no longer valid.
linkExpired.hint: Please contact the survey administrator for a new link.

linkDeactivated.title: Link Deactivated
linkDeactivated.description: This survey link has been deactivated by the administrator.
linkDeactivated.hint: Please contact the survey administrator for assistance.

linkInvalid.title: Invalid Link
linkInvalid.description: This survey link is no longer valid.
linkInvalid.hint: Please check the link and try again, or contact the survey administrator.

maxUsageReached.title: Link Usage Limit Reached
maxUsageReached.description: This survey link has reached its maximum usage limit.
maxUsageReached.hint: Please contact the survey administrator for a new link.

surveyNotAccepting.title: Survey Closed
surveyNotAccepting.description: This survey is not currently accepting responses.
surveyNotAccepting.hint: The survey may have been closed or has not yet started.

password.title: Password Required
password.description: This survey requires a password to access.

validation.selectAtLeast: Please select at least one option
validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
validation.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

question.fileDrop: Drop files here or click to upload
